.. TelescopeML documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Tue Dec 27 15:39:09 2022.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.


``TelescopeML`` is a python library to analyze stellar and exoplanetary telescope spectra and extract the invaluable information there.
It consists of a set of modules and trained ML models utilizing the developed deep Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) and Machine Learning (ML) models.



TelescopeML
==============


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
